sourcesContent:
import React from "react";
import { Box, Typography, Grid } from "@mui/material";

const AboutUs = () => {
  return (
    <Box width="80%" m="80px auto">
      <Grid container spacing={6} alignItems="center">
        {/* Foto personal */}
        <Grid item xs={12} md={5} lg={6}>
          <Box
            component="img"
            alt="Pablo portrait"
            src="/images/aboutus-photo.jpg"
            sx={{
              width: "100%",
              height: "auto",
              maxHeight: { lg: "700px", xl: "700px" }, // límite en pantallas grandes
              objectFit: "contain", // mantiene proporción sin recortar
              borderRadius: "8px",
              mx: "auto", // centra si sobra espacio
              display: "block",
            }}
          />
        </Grid>

        {/* Biografía */}
        <Grid item xs={12} md={7} lg={6}>
          <Typography variant="h3" fontWeight="bold" gutterBottom>
            About Us
          </Typography>
          <Typography variant="body1" sx={{ mt: 2, lineHeight: 1.6 }}>
            Hi, I’m Pablo, the founder and driving force behind this record store project. Music has always been at the core of my life — from years as a sound designer and collector, to building a community through Allmyrecords & Discogs. Over time, I’ve combined this passion with technology, transitioning into web development and front-end design.
          </Typography>
          <Typography variant="body1" sx={{ mt: 2, lineHeight: 1.6 }}>
            This project is more than just an e-commerce demo — it’s a space where my two worlds meet: the love for vinyl records and the creative possibilities of coding. Every detail you see here is guided by the idea of making music discovery and collecting meaningful, simple, and inspiring.
          </Typography>
          <Typography variant="body1" sx={{ mt: 2, lineHeight: 1.6 }}>
            Thanks for stopping by and sharing a piece of this journey. Whether you’re a passionate collector or just curious about records, I hope you enjoy exploring this project as much as I enjoyed creating it.
          </Typography>
          {/* Párrafos añadidos */}
          <Typography variant="body1" sx={{ mt: 2, lineHeight: 1.6 }}>
            My journey began in Buenos Aires, surrounded by the city’s vibrant music scene. From my early days producing beats and experimenting with synthesizers, music was not just a hobby, but a powerful engine that shaped my lifestyle and career choices. The process of crate digging—spending hours in record shops searching for hidden gems—fueled an endless curiosity to discover new sounds and stories behind each vinyl[web:1].
          </Typography>
          <Typography variant="body1" sx={{ mt: 2, lineHeight: 1.6 }}>
            Over the years, I’ve collaborated with musicians, producers, and labels; designing experiences and curating collections for projects that have reached audiences locally and globally. My work as a sound designer and curator taught me the importance of community: every conversation, every recommendation, every shared discovery builds a bridge between people and music[web:1].
          </Typography>
          <Typography variant="body1" sx={{ mt: 2, lineHeight: 1.6 }}>
            When I dove into web development, it felt natural to combine my technical side with my musical roots. Technology became a tool for amplifying stories and making music more accessible. This store is the end result: a digital extension of the spaces where music mattered in my life — not just a place to buy records, but to connect, learn, and share passion[web:1].
          </Typography>
          <Typography variant="body1" sx={{ mt: 2, lineHeight: 1.6 }}>
            Each record in the catalog has a reason to be here: some remind me of legendary sessions in studios, others of the transformative impact of a single track or album. The site is a reflection of years spent listening, collecting, and living music’s evolution.
          </Typography>
          <Typography variant="body1" sx={{ mt: 2, lineHeight: 1.6 }}>
            Whether you are a seasoned digger, an aspiring DJ, or simply rediscovering the world of vinyl, I invite you to explore and find your story within these grooves. Music builds identity; these records are footsteps in my own, and now they’re part of a new chapter online.
          </Typography>
        </Grid>
      </Grid>
    </Box>
  );
};

export default AboutUs;
